Class BBQChicken

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizzeria.pizzaria.src.Pizza
com.example.rupizzeria.pizzaria.src.BBQChicken
public class BBQChicken extends Pizza
This class represents a BBQ Chicken pizza which extends the Pizza class. It includes specific pricing based on size and inherits topping, crust, and size properties.
Author:
Nithya Konduru, Dhyanashri Raman

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BBQChicken()
    Creates a default BBQ Chicken pizza with no parameters.
    BBQChicken(ArrayList<Topping> toppings, Crust crust, Size size)
    Creates a BBQ Chicken pizza with the specified toppings, crust type, and size.

  • Constructor Details

    • BBQChicken

      public BBQChicken(ArrayList<Topping> toppings, Crust crust, Size size)
      Creates a BBQ Chicken pizza with the specified toppings, crust type, and size.
      Parameters:
      toppings - the list of toppings on the pizza.
      crust - the type of crust for the pizza.
      size - the size of the pizza.

    • BBQChicken

      public BBQChicken()
      Creates a default BBQ Chicken pizza with no parameters. It does nothing until properties are set.

  • Method Details

    • price

      public double price()
      Calculates and returns the price of the BBQ Chicken pizza based on its size.
      Specified by:
      price in class Pizza
      Returns:
      the price of the pizza as a double value.
